WaveShaperNodeCurve.summary: The curve property of the interface is a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} of numbers describing the distortion to apply.

remarks.para: The mid-element of the array is applied to any signal value of 0, the first one to signal values of -1, and the last to signal values of 1; values lower than -1 or greater than 1 are treated like -1 or 1 respectively.
If necessary, intermediate values of the distortion curve are linearly interpolated.

blockquote.para: Note: The array can be a null value: in that case, no distortion is applied to the input signal.
